name: Flux Blade
description: A blade born from raw Flux energy, pulsing with a faint glow.

name: Archivist's Lens
special_effect: Gives a character a small speed boost and allows them to see the top card of the opponent's deck.
description: A precision tool used by Archivists to analyze the flow of Flux.

name: Corrupted Shard
special_effect: Deals a small amount of damage to the attached character each turn.
description: A dangerous shard from the Rift, granting great power at a cost.

name: Grift Key
special_effect: Unlocks a new Rift event on the map for a short time.
description: A small, unassuming key said to unlock minor Grifts and secrets.

name: Scrapling Wrench
special_effect: Can be used to repair a damaged relic once per battle.
description: A crudely-made wrench, perfect for fixing broken things or dealing a tiny blow.

name: Constellated Shield
description: A polished shield bearing the mark of an ancient constellation.

name: Void Crystal
special_effect: A chance to momentarily freeze an enemy character.
description: A crystal pulsing with empty energy from the Rift, heavy to wield.

name: Luminous Orb
special_effect: Grants the ability to draw an extra card from the deck.
description: A small orb that illuminates the path forward, revealing hidden truths.

name: Aetherium Core
special_effect: Transforms into a more powerful form for a limited time in battle.
description: The heart of a fallen star, brimming with raw, untamed Flux energy.

name: Rustfang Dagger
description: A dagger pulled from a broken world, with a faint corroding aura

name: Obsidian Glaive
description: A sharp, heavy glaive forged from solidified magic.

name: Scrapling Jetpack
description: A jury-rigged contraption that boosts a character's speed.

name: Chaos Engine
special_effect: Causes a random positive or negative effect on the field each turn.
description: A strange machine that runs on chaotic Flux, its purpose is a mystery.

name: Archivist's Staff
special_effect: Can absorb the energy of one enemy's ability, preventing its use.
description: A ceremonial staff of the Archivists, used to command the flow of Flux.

name: Cosmic Compass
special_effect: Allows the player to see the top three cards of their deck and rearrange them.
description: A mystical compass that always points toward the most powerful Flux source.

name: Aetherium Ring
special_effect: Grants a small chance to dodge an attack.
description: A ring forged from pure Aetherium, light and nimble.

name: Temporal Gauntlet
special_effect: Can revert the battlefield to a previous turn's state once per battle.
description: A gauntlet that allows the wielder to manipulate the flow of time.

name: Scrapling Cannon
special_effect: Has a chance to misfire and damage the wielder.
description: A high-risk, high-reward cannon cobbled together from discarded technology.

name: Corrupted Helm
special_effect: The character wearing this helm cannot be affected by any other relic.
description: A mind-altering helm from the Rift, giving immense power and a terrifying new purpose.

name: Flux Prism
special_effect: Can change the faction of a friendly character for one turn, granting them new abilities.
description: A legendary relic that can refract and redirect the raw energy of the Flux itself.
